RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH:
Fundador da consultoria de marketing digital Web Estratйgica, й autor do best-seller "Marketing de Conteъdo: A Moeda do Sйculo XXI", publicado no Brasil pela DVS Editora e em Portugal pela Editora Marcador.

Possui MBA em Marketing pela Fundaзгo Getъlio Vargas (FGV) em 2013. 

Fundou seu primeiro negуcio em 2002, de onde saiu no final de 2010. Foi sуcio de outros negуcios desde entгo, mantendo sempre como atividade principal a direзгo geral da Web Estratйgica Consultoria. Jб atendeu mais de 1.300 clientes em 22 anos de carreira.

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN:
Founder of the digital marketing consulting Web Estrategica, is the author of the bestseller "Content marketing: The currency of the 21st Century", published in Brazil by DVS Editora and in Portugal by Editora Marcador.

MBA in Marketing at Fundaзгo Getъlio Vargas (FGV) in 2013. 

He founded his first business in 2002, where he left at the end of 2010. He has been partner of other business since then, always keeping as main activity the general direction of Web Estrategica Consulting. He has attended more than 1,300 clients in 22 years of career.

Recurring speaker at the best Marketing events in Brazil.

In addition to entrepreneur and consultant, he is professor of MBA, postgraduate and extension in several institutions: HSM Educaзгo, Impacta, Cambury, Febracorp, ESAMC, ESPM, Insper, FGV, New School of Marketing and IPOG.
